DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate immunogenicity , safety reactogenicity one dose four different formulation MenACWY conjugate vaccine give healthy subject age 15-19 year . The selection best formulation base data obtain one month vaccine dose .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate 4 Different Formulations Meningococcal Serogroups A , C , W-135 , Y Conjugate Vaccine When Given 1 Dose Healthy Subjects Aged 15-19 Yrs
DOC.detailed_description: The study open . However , 4 different formulation GSK 's MenACWY conjugate vaccine administer double-blind manner . Mencevax™ ACWY vaccine serve active control . Subjects receive one vaccine dose ( GSK 's MenACWY conjugate vaccine Mencevax™ ACWY vaccine ) , 2 blood sample take , one month vaccination .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female , include , 15 19 year age time vaccination . Subject previously complete routine childhood vaccination best his/her knowledge his/her parents'/guardians ' knowledge . Female subject nonchildbearing potential . Previous vaccination OR history OR exposure within previous 12 month meningococcal serogroup A , C , W135 Y disease . Administration tetanus vaccine within 6 month study vaccination . Any confirm suspected immunosuppressive immunodeficient condition , include human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection . A family history congenital hereditary immunodeficiency . History neurologic disorder seizure .
DOC.keyword: Meningococcal serogroups A , C , W-135 , Y disease
